text: Vasily Surikov () is a 1959 Soviet drama movie directed by Anatoli Rybakov.«Арт-парк» приглашает метрогородцев на серию кинопоказов «Художники в кино»Василий Суриков It stars Yevgeni Lazarev, Larisa Kadochnikova, and Leonid Gallis. == Actors == * Yevgeni Lazarev as Vasily Ivanovich Surikov * Larisa Kadochnikova as Yelizaveta Avgustovna Surikova * Leonid Gallis as Avgust Share, Lilya's father * Gennady Yudin as Aleksei Alekseyevich Lunyov * Georgy Vitsin as Ilya Yefimovich Repin == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet movies Category:1959 movies Category:Soviet drama movies
title: Vasily Surikov (movie)
